long_description: A fan-based trainer for the discerning casual rider, the Kinetic Cyclone 2.0 Bike Trainer harnesses the natural resistance of wind and offers a realistic feel to make your training a breeze. Dual fans and 2.2 lb. flywheels create realistic resistance to maximize road-like feel during your training. Rubberized, grippy knobs and sturdy design offer excellent stability. Trainer folds in half for easy transport and off-season storage. The Kinetic Cyclone 2.0 Bike Trainer features a larger-than-average roller to reduce tire wear. Compatible with all bikes with 22 - 29 in. diameter wheels and up to 29 x 2.4 in. tires. Comes fully assembled.
short_description: A fan-based trainer for the discerning casual rider, the Kinetic Cyclone 2.0 Bike Trainer harnesses the natural resistance of wind and offers a realistic feel to make your training a breeze.
